sentences.sContent: The refiner defined a definite confine with her fine finger.
sentences.sContent_eng: The refiner defined a definite confine with her fine finger.
sentences.sCn: 提炼者用她精细的手指定义了一个明确的界限。

synos.tran: [纸][化工]精炼机；精制者，精炼者

words.tran: [油气][化工][冶] 精炼的；精确的；微妙的；有教养的
精制；文雅；[化工][油气][冶] 提纯

trans.tranOther: Refiners are people or organizations that refine substances such as oil or sugar in order to sell them
